contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=279 |maint= |map=Route 279-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=48 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page (?), Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=North |direction_b=South |terminus_a=[[Image:qc132.svg|15px]] near [[Beaumont, Quebec|Beaumont]]| |terminus_b=[[Image:qc216.svg|15px]] near [[Buckland, Quebec|Buckland]]| |previous_type=QC |previous_route=277 |next_type=QC |next_route=281 |cities=Saint-Charles-de-Bellechasse |junction= [[Image:Quebec Autoroute 20.svg|15px]] near Beaumont |}} '''Route 279''' is a 48 km two-lane north-south highway in Quebec, Canada, which starts in [[Beaumont, Quebec|Beaumont]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 132|Route 132]] and ends in [[Notre-Dame-Auxiliatrice-de-Buckland, Quebec|Notre-Dame-Auxiliatrice-de-Buckland]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 216|Route 216]]. The road goes through the Grande Plée Bleue between Beaumont and [[Saint-Charles-de-Bellechasse, Quebec|Saint-Charles-de-Bellechasse]], crosses the [[Boyer River (Quebec)|Boyer River]] in St-Charles, and slowly goes up the Appalachian Mountains. ==Towns along Route 279== * Beaumont * Saint-Charles-de-Bellechasse * Saint-Gervais * Saint-Lazare-de-Bellechasse * Saint-Damien-de-Buckland * Buckland ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== <references/> == External links == * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Provincial Route Map (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} * [http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&saddr=Rue+de+L%27Anse+S%2FRTE-279+%4046.829217,+-71.028075&daddr=46.611243,-70.557117&hl=en&geocode=11841283694777803747,46.829217,-71.028075&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=1&sz=13&dirflg=h&sll=46.605936,-70.536518&sspn=0.054249,0.154495&ie=UTF8&ll=46.732331,-70.784912&spn=0.432982,1.235962&z=10 Route 279] on Google Maps {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|279]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
